# wideCell()

**Type Method**

Creates the default configuration for a wide media item cell.

## Declaration

```swift
static func wideCell() -> TVMediaItemContentConfiguration
```

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.tvuikit/documentation/TVUIKit/TVMediaItemContentConfiguration-swift.struct] instance for a wide cell with a 16:9 aspect ratio.
title: wideCell()
